alert.note: Alert for Becker; Clay; Mahnomen; Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 5:01PM CDT until July 13 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN CLAY...SOUTHERN NORMAN...SOUTHWESTERN MAHNOMEN AND NORTHWESTERN BECKER COUNTIES... At 500 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Borup, or 26 miles northeast of Fargo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ada, Twin Valley, Ulen, Hitterdal, Felton, Borup and Flom. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
